IEntropy
========

# Available modules


The overview below shows which IEntropy installations are available per HPC-UGent Tier-2 cluster, ordered based on software version (new to old).

To start using IEntropy, load one of these modules using a `module load` command like:

```shell
module load IEntropy/2024.06.12-foss-2023a-R-4.3.2
```
